title: James Blake: Police watchdog substantiates force complaint
text: James Blake: Police watchdog substantiates force complaint - WQOW TV: Eau Claire, WI NEWS18 News, Weather, and Sports Member Center: WQOW - Your Official Packers Station James Blake: Police watchdog substantiates force complaint (AP Photo/David Goldman, File). FILE - In this Sept. 11, 2015, file photo, former tennis pro James Blake, right, acknowledges applause during a semifinal match between Roger Federer, of Switzerland, and Stan Wawrinka, of Switzerland, at the U.S. Open t... Jerry Brown has signed an ambitious measure to combat climate change by increasing California's renewable electricity use to 50 percent and doubling energy efficiency in existing buildings by 2030.
